title: Applying the Associative Property
text: The Associative Property of addition shows that the three numbers can be added in any order.
speech: The Associative Property of addition shows that the three numbers can be added in any order.
pacedSpeech: The Associative Property of addition shows that the three numbers can be added in any order.

title: Simplifying the Expression
text: What is the simplified expression once all terms are added?
